en: President of the People's Republic of China
Chairman of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的虚位国家元首和国家机构，与全国人大常委会联合行使国家元首职权。该职务设立于1954年，在1975年至1982年间被废除，后于1982年宪法中恢复。
description.en: The ceremonial head of state and a state organ of the People's Republic of China, jointly exercising the functions of the head of state with the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress. The post was established in 1954, abolished between 1975 and 1982, and restored in the 1982 Constitution.

description.zh-cn: 现任中华人民共和国主席、中共中央总书记、中央军委主席。是首位任期超过十年的中华人民共和国主席。
description.en: Current President of the People's Republic of China, General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission. He is the first President of the PRC to serve for more than ten years.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高国家权力机关，有权选举和罢免国家主席。
description.en: The highest state authority of the People's Republic of China, with the power to elect and recall the President of the state.

nodes.id: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会的常设机关，与国家主席共同行使国家元首职权。
description.en: The permanent body of the National People's Congress, which jointly exercises the powers of the head of state with the President of the PRC.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的主要缔造者。曾任中央人民政府主席和第一任中华人民共和国主席。在文革期间曾意图废除国家主席职位。
description.en: The main founder of the People's Republic of China. He served as the Chairman of the Central People's Government and the first President of the People's Republic of China. He intended to abolish the presidency during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第二任主席，在文化大革命期间遭到罢免和迫害，后被平反。
description.en: The second President of the People's Republic of China, who was dismissed and persecuted during the Cultural Revolution and later rehabilitated.

description.zh-cn: 一场由毛泽东发动的政治运动，导致时任国家主席刘少奇被罢免，国家主席职位长期空缺。
description.en: A political movement initiated by Mao Zedong, which led to the dismissal of then-President Liu Shaoqi and a long-term vacancy in the presidency.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国宪法 (1954年)

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国宪法 (1954年)
en: 1954 Constitution of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第一部宪法，正式设立中华人民共和国主席职位。
description.en: The first constitution of the People's Republic of China, which formally established the position of the President of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国宪法 (1975年)

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国宪法 (1975年)
en: 1975 Constitution of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第二部宪法，废除了国家主席的建制。
description.en: The second constitution of the People's Republic of China, which abolished the office of the President.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国宪法 (1982年)

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国宪法 (1982年)
en: 1982 Constitution of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第四部宪法，恢复设置国家主席和副主席职务。
description.en: The fourth constitution of the People's Republic of China, which re-established the posts of President and Vice President.

description.zh-cn: 1949年至1954年间行使国家元首职权的国家机关，其主席被视为国家主席的前身。
description.en: The state organ that exercised the functions of the head of state from 1949 to 1954, its chairman is considered the predecessor of the President of the PRC.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，曾是毛泽东的法定接班人。在国家主席存废问题上与毛泽东意见相左，后在九一三事件中身亡。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China, once the designated successor to Mao Zedong. He disagreed with Mao on the issue of the presidency and died in the Lin Biao incident.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国主席存废之争

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国主席存废之争
en: Dispute over the existence of the President of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，围绕是否废除国家主席职位在中共高层引发的严重政治争执。
description.en: A serious political dispute among the top leadership of the CCP during the Cultural Revolution regarding whether to abolish the post of President.

description.zh-cn: 中国改革开放的总设计师，指出应恢复设立国家主席，但职权可以规定得虚一点。
description.en: The chief architect of China's reform and opening-up, who pointed out that the presidency should be re-established, but with ceremonial powers.

description.zh-cn: 前中华人民共和国主席、中共中央总书记、中央军委主席。从他开始，最高领导人兼任国家主席成为制度化惯例。
description.en: Former President of the People's Republic of China, General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission. Starting from him, it became an institutionalized practice for the top leader to concurrently hold the presidency.

description.zh-cn: 前中华人民共和国主席、中共中央总书记、中央军委主席。
description.en: Former President of the People's Republic of China, General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记
en: General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高领导人职务，自江泽民起由国家主席兼任，是中华人民共和国实际上的最高领导人。
description.en: The highest leading position in the Chinese Communist Party. Since Jiang Zemin, it has been held concurrently by the President of the PRC, making the holder the de facto paramount leader of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央军事委员会主席

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央军事委员会主席
en: Chairman of the Central Military Commission of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高军事领导人，自江泽民起通常由国家主席兼任。
description.en: The supreme military leader of the Chinese Communist Party, usually held concurrently by the President of the PRC since Jiang Zemin.

nodes.id: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 该届全国人大第一次会议通过了2018年宪法修正案，取消了国家主席的任期限制。
description.en: The first session of this NPC passed the 2018 constitutional amendment, removing the term limits for the President.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国宪法修正案 (2018年)

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国宪法修正案 (2018年)
en: 2018 Constitutional Amendment of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 该宪法修正案删除了国家主席“连续任职不得超过两届”的规定。
description.en: This constitutional amendment removed the provision that the President shall serve no more than two consecutive terms.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会
en: Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央权力机关。
description.en: The central authority of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中华人民共和国副主席，在刘少奇被罢免后与董必武共同代理国家主席职权，后被授予“中华人民共和国名誉主席”称号。
description.en: Served as Vice President of the PRC. After Liu Shaoqi's dismissal, she jointly acted as President with Dong Biwu. She was later awarded the title of "Honorary President of the People's Republic of China".

description.zh-cn: 曾任中华人民共和国副主席，在刘少奇被罢免后代理国家主席职权。
description.en: Served as Vice President of the PRC. After Liu Shaoqi's dismissal, he acted as President.

description.zh-cn: 1982年宪法恢复国家主席后，第一位担任此职务的中共元老。
description.en: After the 1982 Constitution restored the presidency, he was the first CCP veteran to hold this post.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第四任主席。
description.en: The fourth President of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国副主席

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国副主席
en: Vice President of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家副元首，协助主席工作。
description.en: The Vice Head of State of the People's Republic of China, who assists the President.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第八届中央委员会第十二次全体会议

zh-cn: 中国共产党第八届中央委员会第十二次全体会议
en: 12th Plenary Session of the 8th Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 此次会议决定撤销刘少奇党内外一切职务。
description.en: This plenum decided to remove Liu Shaoqi from all his posts both inside and outside the Party.

en: Fifth Plenary Session of the 11th Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 此次会议通过了为刘少奇平反的决议。
description.en: This plenum passed the resolution to rehabilitate Liu Shaoqi.

nodes.id: 第一届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第一届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 该届全国人大制定了第一部《中华人民共和国宪法》，设立了国家主席。
description.en: This NPC formulated the first Constitution of the PRC and established the presidency.

nodes.id: 第四届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第四届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 该届全国人大通过了第二部《中华人民共和国宪法》，废除了国家主席。
description.en: This NPC passed the second Constitution of the PRC and abolished the presidency.

nodes.id: 第五届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第五届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 该届全国人大通过了第四部《中华人民共和国宪法》，恢复了国家主席。
description.en: This NPC passed the fourth Constitution of the PRC and restored the presidency.

nodes.id: 第十四届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第十四届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 该届全国人大选举习近平连任国家主席，开始其第三个任期。
description.en: This NPC elected Xi Jinping to a third term as President.

description.zh-cn: 国家主席是处于最高国家权力机关全国人民代表大会的从属地位的国家机构，由全国人大选举和罢免。
description.en: The President is a state organ subordinate to the National People's Congress, the highest organ of state power, and is elected and can be removed by the NPC.

relationships.source: 全国人民代表大会会议主席团

description.zh-cn: 全国人大主席团有权提名中华人民共和国主席的候选人。
description.en: The Presidium of the National People's Congress has the authority to nominate candidates for the President of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国宪法 (1954年)

description.zh-cn: 1954年宪法首次设立了中华人民共和国主席职务。
description.en: The 1954 Constitution first established the post of President of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.source: 第一届全国人民代表大会
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国宪法 (1954年)

description.zh-cn: 第一届全国人民代表大会第一次会议制定了1954年宪法。
description.en: The first session of the 1st National People's Congress enacted the 1954 Constitution.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，时任国家主席刘少奇被罢免并遭受迫害。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, then-President Liu Shaoqi was dismissed and persecuted.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第八届中央委员会第十二次全体会议

description.zh-cn: 中共八届十二中全会决定撤销刘少奇党内外一切职务，该罢免违宪。
description.en: The 12th Plenary Session of the 8th CCP Central Committee decided to remove Liu Shaoqi from all his posts inside and outside the Party, an unconstitutional removal.

description.zh-cn: 中共十一届五中全会通过了为刘少奇平反的决议，恢复其名誉。
description.en: The 5th Plenary Session of the 11th CCP Central Committee passed a resolution to rehabilitate Liu Shaoqi and restore his reputation.

description.zh-cn: 刘少奇被罢免后，国家主席职位开始长期缺位。
description.en: After Liu Shaoqi was dismissed, the post of President became vacant for a long period.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国宪法 (1975年)

description.zh-cn: 1975年宪法正式取消了国家主席的建制。
description.en: The 1975 Constitution formally abolished the office of the President.

relationships.source: 第四届全国人民代表大会
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国宪法 (1975年)

description.zh-cn: 第四届全国人民代表大会第一次会议通过了1975年宪法。
description.en: The first session of the 4th National People's Congress passed the 1975 Constitution.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国宪法 (1982年)

description.zh-cn: 1982年宪法恢复了中华人民共和国主席和副主席的设置。
description.en: The 1982 Constitution restored the posts of President and Vice President of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.source: 第五届全国人民代表大会
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国宪法 (1982年)

description.zh-cn: 第五届全国人民代表大会第五次会议通过了1982年宪法。
description.en: The fifth session of the 5th National People's Congress passed the 1982 Constitution.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国宪法 (1982年)

description.zh-cn: 邓小平在八二宪法审议过程中指出，还是要设立国家主席，但职权可以规定得虚一点。
description.en: During the deliberation of the 1982 Constitution, Deng Xiaoping pointed out that the presidency should be re-established, but its powers could be defined as more ceremonial.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东有意废除国家主席，而林彪等人不同意，双方为此发生严重争执。
description.en: Mao Zedong intended to abolish the presidency, while Lin Biao and others disagreed, leading to a serious dispute between them.

description.zh-cn: 中央人民政府委员会主席被视为中华人民共和国主席的前身。
description.en: The Chairman of the Central People's Government Council is considered the predecessor of the President of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央委员会
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国宪法修正案 (2018年)

description.zh-cn: 中共中央向全国人大提出了关于修改宪法部分内容的建议，包括取消国家主席的任期限制。
description.en: The CCP Central Committee proposed to the NPC suggestions for amending parts of the Constitution, including the removal of term limits for the President.

relationships.source: 第十三届全国人民代表大会
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国宪法修正案 (2018年)

description.zh-cn: 第十三届全国人大一次会议通过了该宪法修正案。
description.en: The first session of the 13th National People's Congress passed this constitutional amendment.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国宪法修正案 (2018年)

description.zh-cn: 该修正案取消了国家主席和副主席“连续任职不得超过两届”的限制。
description.en: This amendment removed the restriction that the President and Vice President shall serve no more than two consecutive terms.

description.zh-cn: 以国家副主席身份与董必武共同代行主席职权。
description.en: As Vice President, jointly acted as President with Dong Biwu.

description.zh-cn: 1968年至1972年与宋庆龄共同代行主席职权，1972年起单独以代主席名义行使职权。
description.en: From 1968 to 1972, jointly acted as President with Soong Ching-ling; from 1972, he exercised the powers alone as Acting President.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国副主席

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国副主席协助主席工作。
description.en: The Vice President of the People's Republic of China assists the President in his work.

position.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国副主席
position.en: Vice President of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 在江泽民担任国家主席期间，胡锦涛任国家副主席。
description.en: During Jiang Zemin's presidency, Hu Jintao served as Vice President.

position.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国副主席
position.en: Vice President of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 在胡锦涛担任国家主席期间，习近平任国家副主席。
description.en: During Hu Jintao's presidency, Xi Jinping served as Vice President.

relationships.source: 第十四届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 第十四届全国人大一次会议选举习近平为中华人民共和国主席，使其开启第三个任期。
description.en: The first session of the 14th National People's Congress elected Xi Jinping as President of the PRC, beginning his third term.
